
# Heading 1
This is a normal paragraph with some text.

## Heading 2
**Bold text** is important.
*Italic text* is emphasized.
~~Strikethrough text~~ is removed.
***Bold and italic combined***
~~**Bold and strikethrough**~~

### Heading 3

#### Heading 4

##### Heading 5

###### Heading 6

## Lists

### Bullet Lists

* First bullet item
* Second bullet item
* Third bullet item

### Nested Bullet Lists
* Parent item 1

  * Child item 1
  * Child item 2

    * Grandchild item
* Parent item 2

### Numbered Lists

1. First numbered item
2. Second numbered item
3. Third numbered item

### Nested Numbered Lists
4. First item

  1. Nested first
  2. Nested second
5. Second item

## Links
[External link](https://example.com)
[GitHub](https://github.com)

## Tables

|        |        |        |
|--------|--------|--------|
|Header 1|Header 2|Header 3|
|Cell 1-1|Cell 1-2|Cell 1-3|
|Cell 2-1|Cell 2-2|Cell 2-3|


## Code
``inline code here

## Combinations
This paragraph has **bold** and *italic* and ~~strikethrough~~ all together.

## Indentation
  Indented text level 1
    Indented text level 2
      Indented text level 3

## Special Characters
Text with (parentheses) and [brackets] and \*asterisks\* and \~tildes\~
